Package org.example.service

Class RecipesServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.example.service.RecipesServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecipesService
@Service public class RecipesServiceImpl extends Object implements RecipesService
Implementation of RecipesService responsible for handling recipe-related operations.
